en-US.name: All Questions Subscription
en-US.description: Unlock all of the categories in TKO Trivia, and hear the correct answers when you get questions wrong!

customProductPrompts.purchasePromptDescription: You can unlock all of the question categories in TKO Trivia, and you will also hear the correct answer when you get a question wrong!
customProductPrompts.boughtCardDescription: You have successfully unlocked all of the categories!
